explanations.machine learning: The paper uses machine learning techniques for predicting day-ahead financial loss/gain, including feature selection and forecasting engines.
explanations.unsupervised learning: The paper employs k-means clustering, an unsupervised learning technique, to quantize the financial loss/gain time series.
explanations.clustering: The paper explicitly mentions using k-means clustering approach for quantizing the financial loss/gain time series.
explanations.neural network: The paper uses extreme learning machine (ELM) as the forecasting engine, which is a type of neural network.
explanations.feature selection: The paper uses conditional mutual information and sequential forward search as feature selection techniques for the prediction model.
